entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hendrickson Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:01 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:01 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:01 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
